p: The mean numbers of daily captures of males, females and nymphs by pheromone traps were calculated. They were compared firstly within each area for sampling date and for zone; then they were compared between areas, across the sampling period. One-way ANOVA was performed, after tests of homogeneity of variance (Levene) and normality (Shapiro–Wilk), and means were then separated at p < 0.05 using Tukey’s test (IBM SPSS Statistics 25).
